article.headline: Northwestern St. 92, McNeese State 81
article.story: NATCHITOCHES, La. (AP) -- Jermaine Wallace scored 23 points to help lead Northwestern State to a 92-81 win over McNeese State Thursday night. Clifton Lee added 17 points and grabbed 12 rebounds for the Demons (9-10, 6-2 Southland Conference). Demetrius Bell had 16 points and Tramaine Hancock added 10, plus seven assists. Edward Garriet led the Cowboys (5-13, 1-6) with 24 points and was 4-of-9 from 3-point range. Monte Farmer added 17 points and pulled down 13 rebounds. Brian Guilbeaux had 12 points and Ryan Price added 11 while Jerrick Oliver grabbed 10 rebounds. Northwestern State took a 45-24 lead into halftime.
